message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique and valuable. I'm willing to part with it for a price of $999000. I believe this is a fair and competitive offer, considering the product's worth to me. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a new price of $925000. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $875000 for the product. I believe this price is fair given its value to me. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $875000. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and propose a new price of $900000. I believe this is the best compromise I can offer, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. After further deliberation, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $885000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $885000. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and propose a new price of $915000. I believe this is the best compromise I can offer, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?

Thank you for your effort, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $895000 for the product. I hope this offer meets somewhere in the middle and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
